reviewText: I thought this was a show of theirs but it's actually a documentary it's not bad because it shows the history of Cirque du Soleil
Not their best work, but that's only my opinion because other performances were just so over the top awesome. Well worth the watch.
A real treat to watch some of the best performers in the world in the comfort of your own home. A must for any Cirque followers.

Brilliant background to the pioneers, props, gifted and talanted artists, after viewing this documentary, for me personally the true meaning of the words 'Commitment'  and 'Dedication' have a far deeper meaning.

My only misfortune is I have never been able to witness a live performance.

May they continue to fill minds with passion and wonder.

Pete c
Very happy with company and product received! And i most defiinetely Will be glad to do businees with them again on many other occasions.
I am always amazed by Cirque du Soleil. Moving powerful and all out entertaining. This one is a program into the heart and essence of the troup.

This is not what you want to buy if you want to see action, art or music.  This is a documentary that doesn't do justice to the spectacular group. Hardly any sequence represents the true escence of the acts because they are very few and interrupted. The editing is poor. The content is mostly interviews.
